Go Montreal Events.eventDescription: MTLàTABLE is the best excuse to gather around the table with loved ones to celebrate the best Montréal’s culinary scene has to offer.

Mundial Montreal showcases the diversity that defines our society. Canada is a country of immigrants - living on Indigenous land. We want you to experience a mosaic of cultures, united through music. Discover new sounds, engage in meaningful conversations, dance! The music world is meeting in Montreal.
